animateLipidsDescription.value: Whether the phospholipids forming the cell membrane should be animated

playAreaSummaryIntro.value:
An observation window zooms in on a cross-section of a cell's membrane.
The membrane consists of a wiggling phospholipid bilayer, a double-layered sheet
that separates fluids inside and outside of cell. Added solute particles are
suspended in fluid and randomly move with Brownian motion.

playAreaSummarySolutes.value: You can choose from a list of solutes and add them to inside and outside.

playAreaSummaryProteins.value: Transport proteins can be added directly to membrane.

playAreaSummaryVoltagePotential.value: There are options to change membrane voltage potential and optionally hide visual charge labels.

playAreaSummaryBarCharts.value: Solute bar charts provide a comparative summary for amount of each solute inside and outside membrane.

controlAreaSummary.value: There are options for how fast the action happens in the observation window, including a button to pause. Also, you can clear the solutes from both sides of the membrane or reset the sim.

interactionHint.value: Add or remove solute to inside or outside of membrane.

interactionHintWithTransportProteins.value: Add or remove solutes to inside or outside of membrane, and play with transport channels.

accessibleContextResponse.value: Solutes cleared. Add solutes to observe changes

accessibleHelpText.value: Add up to 7 proteins to membrane. Use keyboard shortcuts to grab, sort, and release proteins into membrane.
Play with membrane voltage potential and observe changes.

accessibleContextResponse.value: Positive outside and negative inside; signs densely packed along membrane.
Positive outside and negative inside; signs lightly packed along membrane.
Negative outside and positive inside; signs sparse along membrane.

accessibleHelpText.value: Explore with or without signs showing membrane voltage potential along inside and outside.

toolAccessibleHelpText.value: Grab transporter to pull to membrane.

accessibleHelpText.value: Grab a ligand. When grabbed, use keyboard shortcuts to move ligand to bonding site. Release to bond or let ligands bond naturally.

ligandReleasedOnBusyOrIncompatibleProtei.value: Released. Binding unsuccessful. Ligand floats away.

thereIsNoProteinAtThisSlot.value: There is no protein at this slot

thereIsProteinAtThisSlotPattern.value: There is a {{proteinName}} at this slot

cannotInteractWhileLigandIsBoundPattern.value: Cannot interact with the membrane while {{ligandType}} is bound to a protein

transportProteinBriefName.value:
{ $type ->
[sodiumIonLeakageChannel]         Sodium Ion, Leakage
[potassiumIonLeakageChannel]      Potassium Ion, Leakage
[sodiumIonVoltageGatedChannel]    Sodium Ion, Voltage-Gated
[potassiumIonVoltageGatedChannel] Potassium Ion, Voltage-Gated
[sodiumIonLigandGatedChannel]     Sodium Ion, Ligand-Gated
[potassiumIonLigandGatedChannel]  Potassium Ion, Ligand-Gated
[sodiumPotassiumPump]             Sodium Potassium Pump
*[sodiumGlucoseCotransporter]      Sodium-Glucose Cotransporter
}

soluteControlsAccessibleHelpText.value: Choose solute then add or remove to inside or outside of membrane.

outsideMembraneSpinnerHelpText.value: Add or remove chosen solute to outside of membrane.

insideMembraneSpinnerHelpText.value: Add or remove chosen solute to inside of membrane.

solute.value:
{ $soluteType ->
[oxygen]        oxygen molecules
[carbonDioxide] carbon dioxide molecules
[sodiumIon]     sodium ions
[potassiumIon]  potassium ions
[glucose]       glucose molecules
*[atp]           ATP molecules
}

soluteSpinnerObjectResponsePattern.value:
{ $amount ->
[none] no
[one]  one
[few]  a few
[some] some
*[many] many
} { solute }

soluteBarChartsDescriptionParagraph.value: A barchart for each solute captures changing details. If needed, pause sim to freeze details for reading.

arrowDirectionDescription.value:
{ $direction ->
[upward]   upward arrow indicates passage from outside to inside
*[downward] downward arrow indicates passage from inside to outside
}

barSizeDescription.value:
{ $amount ->
[aLittleMore]  A little more
[aLotMore]     A lot more
[aLittleLess]  A little less
*[aLotLess]     A lot less
} outside than inside

currentDetailsActivityLevel.value:
{ $activityLevel ->
*[calm]            relatively calm
[active]          active
[activeAndPaused] active and paused
}

currentDetails.value: Right now, zoomed-in cross-section of cell's membrane is { currentDetailsActivityLevel } with:

grabbedProteinResponseWithHintPattern.value: { grabbedProteinResponsePattern } Move protein with W, A, S or D key. Space to release.

ligandToggleButtonAccessibleHelpText.value: Add or remove triangle- and star-shaped ligands to outside area of cell.

grabbedLigandResponseWithHintPattern.value: { grabbedLigandResponsePattern } Move ligand with A or D keys. Space to release.

grabbedLigandResponseWithEmptyMembraneHi.value: { grabbedLigandResponsePattern } Space to release. Add transport proteins.

ligandMovedAboveLigandGatedChannelPatter.value:
Above { $openOrClosed ->
[open]   open
*[closed] closed
} { transportProteinBriefName } { $ligandType ->
[triangleLigand] Triangle Site
*[starLigand]     Star Site
}, { $index } of { $transportProteinCount } Proteins.

ligandMovedAboveOtherChannelPattern.value:
Above { $openOrClosed ->
[open]   open
*[closed] closed
} { transportProteinBriefName }, { $index } of { $transportProteinCount } Proteins.
